pr_title: FM2-214: Add delete operation for diagnostic report resource.

timeline.message: FM2-214: Add delete operation for diagnostic report resource.

timeline.body:
Instead of the above code, leverage the util method provided by `FhirProviderUtils.buildDelete()` introduced #214 
```java
return FhirProviderUtils.buildDelete(diagnosticReport);
```
